channel.title: AIDS day
channel.description:
[center][img]http://nazret.com/blog/media/wtl038393.gif[/img][/center]
Today is AIDS day everyone, if you know someone who has AIDS remember to make them happy. If you know someone who has died of AIDS, I am sorry. But atleast donate a small sum of money to fighting AIDS, it kills millions of people every year. My uncle died of AIDS(White side) and my little brother never got to see his face. So please donate to AIDS research charity's, thank you.

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

There isn’t any money in AIDS research/cures, so why would they do it? Before you answer, you have to remember everything in this world is driven by money.

Read full topic

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

People dont care unless it affects them in some way or form.Its just the way humans are,unless you know someone you care about that has AIDS or died from AIDS then you Might care.

Read full topic

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

AIDS is viral disease. The best you can do is treat the symptoms.

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @xtremekilling xtremekilling
item.description:
@xtremekilling wrote:

there have been some evidence that the government is “holding” the cure to cancer, aids, STDs and the whole 9 yards.
The reason for them to “hold” the “cure” is to solve human overpopulation.

yet again, this is a theory, the same as UFOs Aliens, Area 51 and that kind of stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

killerman93:

decrease poverty.

How will donating money help stop poverty? The more people there are, the more poverty there will be. AIDS is nature’s way of taking care of the overpopulation problem

[flamewar]

Read full topic

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

Donating money funds research towards fighting AIDS across the world, people that still have a chance, it will decrease the death rate and decrease poverty.

Read full topic

item.title: AIDS day
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Shit, you’re actually being serious? The dead are just that: dead. What the hell is donating money going to do? Unless you know of a process to cure AIDS that requires an assload of money, I imagine it’s all going straight to the charity’s whore fund.

Read full topic
